availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel R. Nisbet (Hopkins County, Ky, physician )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Son of James Nisbet and Mary Pritchett Nisbet. Married to Emmeline P. Nisbet. Father of Minoona Nisbet and Joseph Nisbet. Married to Elizabeth H. Winstead Nisbet on January 18, 1857. Father of Charles Nisbet and James Nisbet. Physician in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Physician in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 62A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 745.
Sons of the American Revolution Membership Applications, 1889-1970, National Society of the Sons of the American Revolution, Louisville, Ky, National #76259, State #950.
"Dr Samuel Rhea Nisbet (1822-1884)," Find A Grave, Memorial #60229539, accessed October 27, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/60229539.
